SkipCACheck and SkipCNCheck PSSession options are required for New-PSSession on non-Windows platforms.Verifies expected error when SkipCACheck option is missing

Duration0:00:00.037
Failing buildReleaseAutomationTest-114865
OwnerPaul Higinbotham

82:         $er.Exception.ErrorCode | Should -Be $expectedErrorCode

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: The problem is that it's looking for libpsrpclient.so in $pshome/linux-x64 folder.  Even after copying it there, it has some dependencies and the symlinks are going to the wrong version on the OS.

title: SkipCACheck/SkipCNCheck New-PSSession on non-Windows test failing on Debian 10
